SqlMap.name: TbUserAuthRelativeDataSqlProvider
SqlMap.select: select #{tableColumn1} from TB_USER_DATA ud where not exists ( select * from TB_USER_AUTH_RELATIVE uar where ud.USER_ID = uar.RELATIVE_USER_ID and uar.USER_ID = @user_id ) and SCHOOL_TYPE <> 4 #{whereString}
SqlMap.column: uar.USER_ID, uar.RELATIVE_USER_ID, uar.NODE,(select SCHOOL from TB_USER_DATA ud where ud.USER_ID = uar.RELATIVE_USER_ID) as SCHOOL
SqlMap.select: select #{tableColumn2} from TB_USER_AUTH_RELATIVE uar where uar.USER_ID = @user_id
SqlMap.insert: if not exists(select * from TB_USER_AUTH_RELATIVE where RELATIVE_USER_ID = @RELATIVE_USER_ID and USER_ID = @USER_ID ) begin insert into TB_USER_AUTH_RELATIVE (USER_ID, RELATIVE_USER_ID, NODE ,CR_IP, CR_DATE, CR_USER , UP_DATE, UP_USER , UP_IP)values (@USER_ID,@RELATIVE_USER_ID,@NODE,@CR_IP, GETDATE(), @CR_USER, GETDATE(),@CR_USER,@CR_IP) end
SqlMap.delete: delete TB_USER_AUTH_RELATIVE where RELATIVE_USER_ID = @RELATIVE_USER_ID and USER_ID = @USER_ID
